00020 class TSubelementStaticInfo:
00021                      virtual public IElementStaticInfo,
00022                      virtual public IComponentInterfaceExtractor

00024 public:
00025        typedef void* (*InterfaceExtractorPtr)(ComponentType& component);
00026 
00030        TSubelementStaticInfo(const std::string& name, CBaseComponentStaticInfo& owner);
00031

00050        class Registrator
00051        {
00052        public:
00053               typedef InterfaceType* (*ExtractorPtr)(ComponentType& component);
00054 
00055               Registrator(TSubelementStaticInfo& staticInfo,
00056                                    const std::string& interfaceName,
00057                                    ExtractorPtr extractorPtr)
00058               {
00059                      staticInfo.RegisterInterfaceExtractor(interfaceName, reinterpret_cast<InterfaceExtractorPtr>(extractorPtr));
00060               }
00061        };
00062 
00063 private:
00064        typedef QMap<std::string, InterfaceExtractorPtr> InterfaceExtractors;

00078 template <class ComponentType>
00079 void TSubelementStaticInfo<ComponentType>::RegisterInterfaceExtractor(const std::string& interfaceName, InterfaceExtractorPtr extractorPtr)
00080 {
00081        m_interfaceExtractors[interfaceName] = extractorPtr;
00082 }

00094 template <class ComponentType>
00095 IElementStaticInfo::Ids TSubelementStaticInfo<ComponentType>::GetMetaIds(int metaGroupId) const
00096 {
00097        Ids retVal;
00098 
00099        if (metaGroupId == MGI_INTERFACES){
00100               for (         typename InterfaceExtractors::const_iterator iter = m_interfaceExtractors.begin();
00101                                    iter != m_interfaceExtractors.end();
00102                                    ++iter){
00103                      retVal.insert(iter.key());
00104               }
00105        }
00106 
00107        return retVal;
00108 }

00111 //     reimplemented (icomp::IComponentInterfaceExtractor)
00112 
00113 template <class ComponentType>
00114 void* TSubelementStaticInfo<ComponentType>::GetComponentInterface(
00115                      const istd::CClassInfo& interfaceType,
00116                      IComponent& component,
00117                      const std::string& subId) const
00118 {
00119        ComponentType* nativeTypePtr = dynamic_cast<ComponentType*>(&component);
00120        if ((nativeTypePtr != NULL) && subId.empty()){
00121               static istd::CClassInfo compInterfaceType(typeid(icomp::IComponent));
00122 
00123               if (!interfaceType.IsValid() || interfaceType.IsVoid() || (interfaceType == compInterfaceType)){
00124                      return &component;
00125               }
00126 
00127               typename InterfaceExtractors::const_iterator foundIter = m_interfaceExtractors.find(interfaceType.GetName());
00128               if (foundIter != m_interfaceExtractors.end()){
00129                      InterfaceExtractorPtr extractorPtr = foundIter.value();
00130 
00131                      return extractorPtr(*nativeTypePtr);
00132               }
00133 
00134               if (interfaceType.IsConst()){
00135                      istd::CClassInfo nonConstType = interfaceType.GetConstCasted(false);
00136 
00137                      typename InterfaceExtractors::const_iterator foundIter = m_interfaceExtractors.find(nonConstType.GetName());
00138                      if (foundIter != m_interfaceExtractors.end()){
00139                             InterfaceExtractorPtr extractorPtr = foundIter.value();
00140 
00141                             return extractorPtr(*nativeTypePtr);
00142                      }
00143               }
00144        }
00145 
00146        return NULL;
00147 }
